body_html:
"setting the epoch" means using the epoch in place of the global step like

summary_writer.add_summary(sess.run(merge_epoch, feed_dict={}), epoch)

For example, change this line to epoch:
https://github.com/ninotoshi/playground/blob/94ae350318729e4ff4ca961cd1509767e2716af5/tensor_flow/xor/main.py#L138

I expect loss has 0.0 to 8.0k in the horizontal axis while output_[0,0] has 0.0 to 2.0k in the 2nd screen shot above.

body:
"setting the epoch" means using the epoch in place of the global step like

```
summary_writer.add_summary(sess.run(merge_epoch, feed_dict={}), epoch)
```

For example, change this line to `epoch`:
https://github.com/ninotoshi/playground/blob/94ae350318729e4ff4ca961cd1509767e2716af5/tensor_flow/xor/main.py#L138

I expect `loss` has 0.0 to 8.0k in the horizontal axis while `output_[0,0]` has 0.0 to 2.0k in the 2nd screen shot above.
